name: cdk-monorepo-template
description: a template for a monorepo structure that can be used for cdk projects
author: Georg DÃ¶rgeloh

scripts.premerge-coverage: mkdir -p .nyc_output && lerna exec -- cp coverage/coverage-final.json \$LERNA_ROOT_PATH/.nyc_output/coverage-\$LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME.json \|\| true
scripts.update-packagelock: lerna clean --yes && lerna exec -- rm -f package-lock.json && lerna bootstrap --ignore-scripts -- --package-lock-only --no-audit
